source:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_SEQ_00Lisette de Valentione appears mildly distressed.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_SEQ_00※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂のリゼット・ド・ヴァレンティオンは、頭を悩ませているようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_SEQ_01You approach a distressed Lisette de Valentione and learn of her ongoing struggle to educate Astrid, an apprentice emissary. In the midst of their discourse, a moogle by the name of Kupka Kupp appears, and promptly enlists both you and Astrid in a matter of the heart─it seems that his dear friend Elyne requires a special measure of encouragement. After reading her letter idolizing you as an adventurer, it is decided that some time spent at the melancholy girl's long-dreamed-of seaside might help in the formation of a plan. Kupka bids you meet him on the coast of middle La Noscea, near the mouth of the Agelyss River.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_SEQ_01※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

リゼットたちと話した。元気のないエリーヌを励ますため、海へ向かうことになった。中央ラノシアのアジェレス川河口にいる「クプカ・クップ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_SEQ_02<tab>Upon arriving at the mouth of the river, it occurs to Astrid that a painting of the sparkling sea might help lift Elyne out of her melancholy. Kupka volunteers his artistic talents, then suggests that the exotic scent of the flowers which bloom to the northwest of Tiller's Rest would add another stimulating element to Elyne's gift. The chore of picking said flowers falls to you.
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_SEQ_02<tab>クプカ・クップから、手土産の調達を頼まれた。開拓者の納屋北西で「香り高い花」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_SEQ_03<tab>You carefully select some sweet-smelling flowers to present alongside Kupka's painting. Return to the moogle at the mouth of the Agelyss River.
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_SEQ_03<tab>香り高い花を入手した。アジェレス川河口の「クプカ・クップ」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_SEQ_04<tab>Kupka appears well pleased with your floral selection. Using pigments prepared by Astrid, the moogle has already completed a masterpiece of a picture. The gift of encouraging love is ready. He urges you both to return with him to Gridania and search for Elyne at her usual haunt: Sweetbloom Pier.
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_SEQ_04<tab>クプカ・クップに香り高い花を渡した。東部森林の花蜜桟橋で「エリーヌ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_SEQ_05<tab>Alongside you and Astrid, Kupka presents a starstruck Elyne with the painting and its fragrant accompaniment. Although momentarily buoyed by the thoughtful gift, the young lady sinks back into despondency when pressed to explain her recent dearth of enthusiasm. It would seem that despite her efforts in martial training, Elyne despairs of ever mastering the skills needed to venture beyond the Twelveswood. A few inspiring words from you, her hero, however, has an almost magical effect in improving her outlook. Thus emboldened, Elyne reveals she has a favor she would ask of you...
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_SEQ_05<tab>エリーヌと話した。元気を取り戻した彼女は、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。改めて「エリーヌ」に話しかけて、詳細を聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Kupka Kupp near the mouth of the Agelyss River.
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_TODO_00<tab>アジェレス川河口のクプカ・クップと話す

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_TODO_01<tab>Obtain a sweet-scented posy from the northwest of Tiller's Rest.
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_TODO_01<tab>開拓者の納屋北西で<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E906801 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the sweet-scented posy to Kupka Kupp.
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_TODO_02<tab>クプカ・クップに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E906801 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Elyne at Sweetbloom Pier.
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_TODO_03<tab>花蜜桟橋のエリーヌと話す

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_000_000<tab>Do you feel it, my friend? Love is in the air, and I, Lisette de Valentione, shall encourage one and all to reach out and seize it by the fistful!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_000_000冒険者さん、こんにちは～♪
みんなの愛の伝道師、リゼットちゃんこと、
リゼット・ド・ヴァレンティオンでぇ～っす☆

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_000_001<tab>But wait...I know you! I never forget a champion of ardor and affection! 'Tis simply wonderful to see you again!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_000_001……って、この前の冒険者さんじゃない！
久しぶりに会えて、リゼットす～っごく嬉しいゾッ☆

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_100_001<tab>Ah, Valentione's Day! The time has come for me and my fellow emissaries to enfold this realm in the tender embrace of ardor and affection. But I fear my perfect plan has encountered a tiny wrinkle...
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_100_001愛を伝える祝祭、ヴァレンティオンデーの期間中、
みんなの愛を応援するのが、私たち愛の伝道師の役目♪
でもでも、ちょっぴり困ったことが……

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_000_002<tab>Did you perhaps recognize the anguish in mine eyes─the quiet desperation? Oh, what happy fortune has delivered unto me this gentle savior!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_000_002もしかして……
悩めるリゼットを心配して、声をかけてくれたの？
やだぁ～！　冒険者さんたら、と～っても優しいっ♪

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_000_003<tab>The problem, you see, lies with young Astrid here. Oh, she does well enough as an apprentice, but she insists I allow her free rein as a full emissary. Too soon, I say! The bud has not yet flowered!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_000_003実は、この子……アストリドったらね、
新人の愛の伝道師なんだけど、一人前扱いしてほしいっていうの！
気持ちはわかるんだけど、リゼット的にはまだかなぁ～。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_004<tab>Oh, Lisette. What more must I do to prove myself...?
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_004うぅ……愛の伝道師として、
がんばってきたつもりなのですが……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_005<tab>(-???-)My dear child... Allow me to explain, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_005(-？？？？-)ふっふっふ……。
話は聞かせてもらったクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_006<tab>(-Mysterious Moogle-)One cannot expect to master romance in a matter of months! True understanding of love requires expansive experience and nuanced knowledge! Acquisition of such whimsical wisdom is the work of <var 1A 02 /var>years<var 1A 01 /var>, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_006(-謎のモーグリ族-)愛の伝道師を、ナメちゃいけないクポ！
経験と知識がいっぱいあってこその、伝道師クポよ！
そしてラブを理解するには、とっても時間がかかるクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_007<tab>A moogle...with a heart-shaped pom!? Where did you come from!?
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_007モ、モーグリ族！？
しかも、ポンポンがハート型の……？
突然現れたかと思ったら、いきなり何を……！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_008<tab>I am Kupka Kupp, deliverer of penned passion, and maestro in the myriad matters of the heart! Any amateur emissary would be wise to heed my words, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_008モグは、ラブレターを届ける「ラブの配達士」にして、
モーグリ族の「愛の伝道師」、クプカ・クップ！
そんじょそこらのひよっこ伝道師には、負けないクポよ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_009<tab>...But I did not wing my way here to lecture green-stalked striplings. Nay, it is the adventurer with whom I have business.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_009……って、そうじゃないクポ！
モグの用事は、冒険者さんへのお届け物クポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_010<tab>That letter's author is a girl by the name of Elyne─a dear friend of mine, and an incurable admirer of yours, kupo. Such a plucky young thing, she is, though lately stricken with deepest melancholy...
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_010そのラブレターの差出人はモグのお友達で、
冒険者さんに憧れる、エリーヌっていう女の子クポ。
ただ、最近どうにも元気がなくて、とっても心配クポ……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_011<tab>I cannot bear to see her brood so! If you will only help me, I am sure we can restore her usual good cheer, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_011そこで、モグは考えたクポ！
あの子が憧れている冒険者のキミに、
元気づけるための協力をお願いしたいクポよ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_Q2_100_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_Q2_100_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_A1_100_001<tab>I'd be happy to!
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_A1_100_001<tab>もちろん喜んで！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_A2_100_002<tab>As long as I don't do all the work...
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_A2_100_002<tab>クプカ・クップも働くなら……

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_012<tab>
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_012<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_000_013<tab>
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_000_013<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_014<tab>Then you must allow me to help as well! We serve the cause of love in all its forms, and a mission born of friendship certainly qualifies.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_014そ、それなら、私にも協力させてください！
お友達を想う友愛の心だって、愛のかたちのはずですから……！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_015<tab>The more the merrier, kupo! I'll not turn away aid freely offered, even from a fumbling fledgling.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_015協力者は、多いほうがいいクポ！
手伝ってもらえるなら、ひよっこ伝道師も歓迎クポ～！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_016<tab>Hmph. Well, I promise this “fumbling fledgling” will endeavor to do her best.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_016くっ……こうなったら、ひよっこ返上のためにも、
最大限の努力をさせてもらいます！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_017<tab>First things first: why don't we hear what Elyne has to say in her missive to you, adventurer? Just as the eyes are windows to the soul, so might her words permit us a glimpse into her heart.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_017冒険者さん、まずはお手紙を読んでみませんか？
ラブレターは、本心が文面に表れるもの……
手がかりが見つかるかもしれません！

source:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_018(-Elyne's Letter-)Dear )) (( )) 02 /var>,
I hope this letter finds you well. I've always heard how brave you are, so I decided to be brave too and tell you my story.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_018(-エリーヌからの手紙-))) (( )) 02 /var>さん、こんにちは。
あなたの噂を聞いて、がんばっている姿を見てから、
ずっと憧れていて……勇気を出して、お手紙を書いてみたよ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_019<tab>(-Elyne's Letter-)<var 1A 02 /var>The truth is, I've never been outside the Twelveswood. I dreamed of building my strength and skills so that I could follow in your footsteps, and maybe one day see the sea with my very own eyes.<var 1A 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_019(-エリーヌからの手紙-)私は、黒衣森を出たことがないんだ。
いつか強くなれたら、あなたみたいに旅立って、
ここにはない「海」を見に行きたいと思っているんだけど……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_020<tab>(-Elyne's Letter-)<var 1A 02 /var>But now I'm not sure that day will ever come. I suppose I'll just have to imagine those sparkling shores, and be content with the tales of your adventures. I hope the roads you travel always bring you home safe and sound.<var 1A 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_020(-エリーヌからの手紙-)やっぱり、私には旅なんて無理かなって。
だから私の分も、素敵な旅を続けてほしいな……。
旅の安全を、いつもお祈りしているね。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_021<tab>'Tis obvious she thinks the world of you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I wonder, then, what caused her to abandon her plans to travel the realm as you do.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_021憧れの人への、素直な気持ちが表れていますね。
でも、冒険者さんのように、旅をしたいっていう願いを、
諦めてしまっているのは何故でしょう……？

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_022<tab>Elyne has spent long hours drilling in spear and bow, preparing herself for adventure... It makes no sense for her to suddenly give up, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_022エリーヌは、冒険者になるために、
槍や弓の稽古を、がんばってきたクポよ。
どうして諦めちゃったのか、モグにはわからないクポ……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_023<tab>It certainly is a mystery. She loves the sea, yes? Perhaps if we visit the shore ourselves, it might provide the inspiration we need to encourage her.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_023そんな努力までしてきたのなら、深い理由がありそうですね。
ひとまず、彼女の憧れである「海」を見ながら、
元気づける方法を考えてみてはどうでしょう？

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_024<tab>A fine idea, kupo! Come along with me to middle La Noscea, the pair of you. We can find a nice spot on the coast near the mouth of the Agelyss River!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_024それはいい考えクポ！
中央ラノシアの「アジェレス川」のあたりは、
とっても眺めがいいから、そこに集合するクポ～！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_025<tab>
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_025<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_000_026<tab>This is what Valentione's is all about, my dears. Go on, now! You can leave the festival events to me!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_LISETTE_000_026その意気だゾ、愛の伝道師たちッ☆
森都での祝祭は私にまかせて、みんな頑張ってきてね～♪

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_028<tab>I wish Elyne herself could see this. But if she can't─or won't─make the journey, then what would be the next best thing...?
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_028海を見せてあげられたらいいのでしょうけど、
そうもいかないとすれば……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_030<tab>Elyne loves to hear about the world beyond the Twelveswood, kupo! When I tell tales of my travels, she always hangs on every word.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_030エリーヌは、黒衣森の外に興味津々クポ！
モグがおでかけした場所の話をすると、
いつも喜んでくれるクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_031<tab>She seems especially enraptured by the idea of ocean waters sparkling in the sunlight. I suppose when one has lived one's whole life amongst the trees, such a sight sounds splendid indeed.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_031天気がいいと、海がキラキラ光ってキレイだって話したら、
あの子はとっても気に入ってくれたクポ。
黒衣森には海がないから、きっと憧れているクポよ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_032<tab>What if we were to bring such a sight <var 1A 02 /var>to<var 1A 01 /var> Elyne? Perhaps a painting of the sea and its grandeur would serve to stoke the fires of this dream she has let burn so low!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_032それなら、この景色を描いた絵を贈るのは、どうでしょう？
海の美しさを感じることで、諦めてしまった夢について、
もう一度、向き合う気持ちになれるかも……！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_033<tab>...It just might work, kupo! Yes, I must have a canvas at once!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_033おお……とってもいい案クポ！
それならモグが、がんばって描いてみるクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_034<tab>Whilst I am occupied with my easel, you must gather a posy of the sweet-scented flowers from hereabouts. The heady fragrance of Vylbrand will surely excite Elyne's senses just as well as the sight of its beauty.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_034そうしたら、冒険者さんには、
この近くでいい香りのお花を探してほしいクポ！
視覚に加えて、嗅覚でもここの魅力を伝えるクポよ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_035<tab>
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_035<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_036<tab>
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_036<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_037<tab>Might I suggest the blooms just northwest of Tiller's Rest? Those are particularly lovely, and shall perfectly complement my art!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_037開拓者の納屋の北西に咲いているお花は、
とってもいい香りだから、プレゼントに最適って評判クポ！
「」を見つけたら、持ってきてほしいクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_038<tab>The flowers if you would, my good <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>. I must make preparations for my artwork!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_038開拓者の納屋の北西に咲いているお花は、
とってもいい香りだから、プレゼントに最適って評判クポ！
「」を見つけたら、持ってきてほしいクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_039<tab>I shall see about providing Kupka with paints and such.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_039絵の具やカンバスの準備も必要になりそうなので、
私はクプカ・クップを手伝っておきますね。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_040<tab>That was quick! But Kupka was even quicker─the painting is finished!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_040おかえりなさい！
クプカ・クップの絵も、完成しましたよ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_041<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You encountered no difficulties picking flowers, I trust?
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_041おかえりクポ～！
「」は調達できたクポ？

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_042<tab>Perfect! A scent almost as evocative of this shoreline as the sea air itself, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_042ばっちりクポ～ッ！
摘んできてくれて、ありがとうクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_043<tab>And with the paints our fledg─er, Miss Astrid was so kind as to provide, I have but this moment completed my depiction of the sea!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_043ひよ……アストリドが素敵な絵の具を用意してくれて、
海の絵も、ちょうど完成したクポよ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_044<tab>I was able to employ a secret an artist once taught me about La Noscean shells: ground up and mixed with water, they make for pigments of surprisingly good quality. It seemed the perfect choice for the task at hand.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_044以前、画家の方に教わったのですが、
ラノシア産の貝殻は、砕くと良質の絵の具になるんです。
お土産の絵に使うなら、これしかないと思いまして……！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_045<tab>Pray forgive me for calling you a stripling, kupo! Your assistance has been both apt and timely!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_045ひよっこ伝道師なんて言って、悪かったクポ～。
おかげで、お土産にぴったりの絵が完成したクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_046<tab>Right, then! Now that we have blooms and painting both, let us deliver our bounty of love. If I know Elyne─and I do─she will be mooning about in the vicinity of Sweetbloom Pier, kupo.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_046冒険者さんがお花も用意してくれたし、
さっそく「エリーヌ」にラブをお届けするクポ！
いつも花蜜桟橋のあたりで見かけるから、そこで探すクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It's really you! I... Kupka didn't say anything about bringing you back with him!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_050こっ……こんにちは、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
まさか、クプカ・クップが連れてきてくれるなんて……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_051<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and Astrid have been helping me prepare a little gift for you, Elyne!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_051冒険者さんと、愛の伝道師アストリドに手伝ってもらって、
エリーヌのために、お土産を持ってきたクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_052<tab>My work keeps me ever busy delivering love and happiness to others, but this time it's your turn, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_052いつもは誰かのラブを届けてばかりだけど、
今回はモグのラブを、エリーヌへお届けするクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_053<tab>I've painted you a picture of the La Noscean sea! Do you like it? Astrid here made the paints herself out of seashells, kupo. And <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> carefully picked the perfect flowers to accompany the scene.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_053これはモグが描いた、ラノシアの海の絵クポ！
アストリドが、貝殻で作った絵の具を用意してくれたクポよ。
それから、このいい香りの花は冒険者さんに摘んでもらったクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_054<tab>It's so pretty! And this scent─I could close my eyes and imagine I was on a faraway island!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_054わぁ……すっごく綺麗……！
それに、この香りも……遠い島にいるみたいな気分になるね！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_055<tab>Even more breathtaking sights and sounds─and smells!─await you in distant lands, kupo! Why not go and visit them yourself? Why give up on your dreams?
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_055見たことのない風景を見て、香りも楽しむのが旅の醍醐味クポ！
けど、エリーヌ……冒険者になって旅に出る夢を、
どうして諦めちゃったクポ？

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_056<tab>Oh, Kupka...
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_056<tab>そ、それは…………

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_100_056<tab>I tried to do better, I really did. But no matter how much I practiced my archery and spearwork, I never seemed to improve compared to the other students.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_100_056冒険者になるために、弓や槍のお稽古を続けてるんだけど、
ほかの子と違って、ぜんぜん上達しなくって…………

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_057<tab>Just wandering the Twelveswood is dangerous enough. If I can't even protect myself here, how could I think of exploring further? It was a silly idea...
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_057黒衣森を歩くのだって、危険がいっぱい。
森の外を旅するなら、自分のことは自分で守れないとでしょ？
でも、私にはできそうにもないかなって……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_A1_000_001<tab>You should keep up your training.
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_A1_000_001<tab>稽古を続けてみよう

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_A2_000_002<tab>Why not try conjury instead?
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_A2_000_002<tab>幻術を学んでみたら？

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_A3_000_003<tab>Have you looked into botany?
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_A3_000_003<tab>園芸師の道を進んでみては？

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_058<tab>Will it make any difference, you think? But maybe you're right. Maybe I gave up too soon!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_058お稽古を続けたら、うまくなれるかな？
ちょっと不安だけど……もう少しがんばってみる！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_059<tab>I...never thought of that. There's more than one way to become an adventurer, isn't there? I should go and visit the Conjurers' Guild!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_059そっか……冒険者になる方法は、たくさんあるもんね。
今度、幻術士ギルドに行って、相談してみようかな……！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_060<tab>Become a botanist, you mean? I guess they do learn how to move safely through the wilds. That could be useful to know!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_060そっか……園芸師さんだって、
魔物がいる危ないところに行くんだものね。
こっそり歩く方法、お勉強してみようかな！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_061<tab>Thank you Astrid, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─a little gift and a few inspiring words have done the trick! How delightful to see Elyne so positive again, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_061冒険者さん、アストリド！
協力してくれて、本当にありがとうクポ！
エリーヌに、元気が戻ってきたクポよ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_062<tab>I am thrilled to have been of service! And, yes, what a wonderful feeling to put a smile on your dear friend's face!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ASTRID_000_062お役に立てたようで、よかったです！
エリーヌさんの笑顔を見られて、私も安心しました。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_063<tab>
target: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_063<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_064<tab>Hmmm, feeling, feeling... Why do I have the feeling I'm forgetting something, kupo?
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_064……あれ？
エリーヌが元気になってホッとしたら、
なにか、大事なことを忘れている気がしてきたクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_065<tab>Ah! Pluck my pom, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_065ああっ！
しまったクポ！！

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_066<tab>I still have a delivery to make in Ul'dah! The Songbirds must have their love letters, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_KUPUKAKOPP_000_066ウルダハへのお届け物が、まだ残っていたクポ！
三歌姫さんたちに、ラブレターをお届けしないとクポよ……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_067<tab>Um, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? If you're not in too much of a hurry, do you think I could ask you a favor...?
target:
TEXT_FESVLT701_03996_ELYNE_000_067)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
その、お願いしたいことがあるんだけど……。
まだ時間があったら、お話を聞いてほしいな。
